amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding to the National Forest System account for purposes of eradicating, enforcing, and remediating illegal marijuana grow operations on National Forest System land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
